name: ACME Storage
description:
Made for TriJam #181

Theme: Storage Management came up with concept of The Pink Bunny night manager at acme storage. An earthquake hits and drops crates from the shelfs. You can only catch the wooden crates. The fallen saws and iron crates kill the bunny.

Keys are arrow keys left and right, the up key creates a dash/turbo effect.

You have one minute to get a high score. Game gets faster every 10 seconds.

Struggled with time on this one. The dash and animations took me a while to figure out but glad to learn some new skills. Enjoy.

NB: My high score is 360, let me know if you can beat it.
